121.content:
MP: 100/100
Gold: 10
Inventory: Priestess outfit, steel rod

You are a teenage girl from a small hamlet. You serve as a priestess in the local temple, dedicated to the worship of the Goddess. Monster boys have raided your village since you can remember, but you've never felt the need to actively fight them. That all changed one night when you had an extremely close encounter with a bunny boy that slipped through the night sentries' guard. He pinned you against the bed and shoved his malodorous feet in your face while stroking himself. You can still recall the smug look of satisfaction across his face, only able to glimpse it through between his toes. He would've surely knocked you out and dragged you back to his warren, had a villager not noticed his presence and warded him off with a pitchfork. Since then, you've decided that you must eliminate the Monster King, lest you live in terror of the monster boys and their feet for the rest of your life. Armed only with a metal rod typically used for ceremonial purposes, you set out on your adventure.
121.title: Teen

1211.content: You decided that the best course of action would be to travel to the nearest city and better equip yourself. Unfortunately, the nearest city is Nanmir, and in order to reach it, you must walk through the forest for about four hours. Travelling alone is basically begging to encounter a monster boy, but you have no choice. As you make your way into the forest, the canopy ahead grows denser and the trees grow thicker, further obscuring your vision. All you can see is the path ahead of you, and even that proves difficult. It isn't long until you're stopped by...
1211.title: You travel to the nearest city for supplies.

12111.content:
you were walking in what seemed to be a darker and darker forest. Even if it was only the beginning of the afternoon, it almost looked like the sun was about to fall ... you were a bit tired by that walking and the darkness could offer an advantage to monsters who would try to attack you! Talking about attacks, it seems one vicious monster tried his luck against you as he jumped from the branches he was hiding. That sneaky attack took you by surprise and all you could see before you fall on the ground was a small pair of green feet ... that hitted you on the face! Making you lose 5 MP (95/100 remaining). You tried to get up as quickly as possible, but before you could, the goblin was already there ... those creatures are small but quite fast and agile. He had a grin on his face while he was rubbing his foot on your face! Making you lose 5 more MP (90/100 remaining). That gobling quickly took 10 of your MP, you definitely had to be careful!

Now that you could see him better, you noticed he was small even for a goblin. Usually goblins have a size of 140 cm in average but this one was more like a teen goblin, his height was about 120 cm more or less. He was actually smaller than you.

"I walked a lot in that forest and I thought your face would make a good doormat for my dirty feet"!

The goblin's feet were indeed full of dirt! How dared he humiliate you like that?! by looking more at him, you noticed he was a scout goblin with a weak armor: his clothes were totally normal and he had 0 armor point. Your attack is 2 (bare hand + rod = 1 + 1) so you could inflict him 2 damages per attack and he had 5 HP. This scout goblin was a lv 1 monster.


What will you do?
12111.title: Sneaky attack!

121111.content:
"Why you little..."

You were not about to let yourself be humiliated by a puny goblin! You reared back, then swung your rod into the goblin's head. He suffers two HP of damage. The goblin staggers backwards, rubbing his skull.

"Hey, that really hurt! Now you're really gonna get it..."

Before you can react, the agile goblin leaps toward you! Instead of tackling you like you would expect, he climbs onto the back of your head! He wraps his legs around your neck and smothers you with his dirty, stinky feet! You take 5 more MP of damage while the goblin rubs his feet into your face.

"C'mon, take a big whiff! I know you human types love some dirty goblin feet! Maybe if you beg, I'll let you lick them clean!" The goblin's taunting and teasing causes you to take 5 more MP of damage! If you don't do something, the smell of feet is going to make you sick!

Your MP: 80/100
Goblin's HP: 3/5
121111.title: Fight back!

1211111.content:
the agility of your opponent took you by surprisebut you were able to keep your calm instead of panicking. The goblin obviously didn't expected you to stay focused as you took his arm and violently threw him on the ground.

"Aaaaargh! You little! Aaaaaargh!"

While he was on the ground, you attacked him with your rod making him lose 2 HP. Only 1 HP remaining for him. One more attack and he would be defeated but for now ... he was still alive and motivated by revenge obviously!

He dashed at you and griped your wrists with his hands with an unexpected speed.

"What the ... ?"

but before you could finish your question, some dirty goblin feet covered your mouth! The goblin just jumped and used your wrists not to fall on the ground. his feet were once again near your mouth ... making you lose more MP (-5). You started to feel weird.

"What's wrong human? Do you give up?"



What will you do?

you: 75/100 MP
Goblin: 1/5 HP


Note: goblin's pose is similar to this: https://i.ytimg.com/vi/cgDt1nL26d8/maxre...

Note 2: You have now lost 1/4 of your MP, you start to think monsters' feet aren't that bad!
1211111.title: counterattack!

12111111.content:
"Argh, get off of me!" As you shout, one of the goblin's filthy toes enter your mouth. It's dirty, and sweaty, and salty, and... kind of... tasty, if you were being honest with yourself. You quickly run your tongue across the toe before you come to your senses realize what you're doing. (-5 MP)

Unfortunately, the goblin felt your wanting tongue across his toe. "That's it, bitch! You looooooove dirty, sweaty, nasty feet! Give up and suck on my toes, footslut!" Maybe he's right. Tons of women, and even men give themselves up to monster boys willingly, and even beg them to worship their feet. Maybe you should... (-5 MP)

N-no! You have a job to do! You swing around wildly. Luckily, you manage to slam the goblin into a tree. He yelps before he's sent crashing to the ground. (-1 HP)

You've defeated the goblin!

His bruised body bounces against the ground. He staggers to his feet, and limps into the thick trees. As he does, you can hear him rant. "Stupid bitch! I'll be back, and I'll MAKE you love my feet, ya hear?"

You notice a few pieces of gold fell from the goblin's pockets after he fell to the ground...

You now have 15 gold.

Your MP: 65/100
12111111.title: fight back or submit

choices: the left path! (more safe but longer)
The right path! (more dangerous but shorter).
121111111.content:
"pfiou! It was about time! A little more and I was about too ..." You blushed while thinking of what could happen if you were in contact with his feet. You shamefully thought of that creature's green feet! Despite that dirt they were honnestly not that bad ... at that moment you came back to your sense and realized you'd need to focuse to accomplish your mission!

You continued to walk more carefully than ever ... who knows if another creature was hidding and waiting for you to let your guard down. While you continued to walk, you could see some pretty flowers and could hear some birds. You were thinking of how you'd like to be a bird right now ... it was nice not to have such a burden on your shoulders.

A few minutes after that, there was an intersection. You remembered the path on the right was shorter but when you looked at it ... it seemed darker and more dangerous than the left path ... but even if he left path looks more safe, you know it will take you more time to reach the town.

Where will you go?
121111111.title: Continue down the forest road...

1211111111.content:
You decided to take the left path. You barely held your own against the goblin, and you can hardly fathom the horrors the right path surely holds.

After awhile, you came across a strange mushroom on the side of the path. You crouched down to get a better look at it, to see if it was edible. It looks very odd: it has an ovalish shape, with five bulbous growths coming out the shorter side. Suddenly, the mushroom emitted a cloud of spores into your face! The scent was very musky and vinegary, but also, oddly pleasant, as if you could wear perfume made of the spores. Just then, the image of the goblin's dirty feet flashed across your mind. You felt your hips begin to tremble with lust... (-2 MP)

You stand back up and distance yourself from the mushroom. Looking ahead, you can see the area filled with these mushrooms, and all of them are pumping their footy spores into the air. You don't like the looks of this, but it's getting to late to turn back. You cover your face with your hand and start running forward.

You try to take as few breaths as possible, but you still sneak in a few while running. Each time you do, you can hear a voice in your head telling you to stop and breath deeply. Stop... and smell the footshrooms. Eventually, a cute monster boy with nice, stinky feet will come along and make you his footbitch, and you can smell his feet as much as you want you... That's what you want, isn't it? A pair of nice, hot, dirty, stinky monster boy feet? You love monster boys, and more importantly, you love their nasty feet... (-13 MP)

Eventually, you make it out of the mushrooms. You fall to your knees, panting and gasping for fresh air. You can't stop thinking about monster boys' feet. If you were in that cloud any longer, you may have stopped and succumbed to the shrooms. On the bright side, Nanmir is so close... you only have to walk for a few more minutes before you can spot the city on the horizon...

Your MP: 50/100
(Your MP is getting dangerously low. You fantasize about monster boy feet often.)

The mushroom and the goblin's feet were very present in your head! you couldn't believe what you were thining those monsters were horri ... bly sexy? No ... they had horri ... wonderful feet ? there was a troll, just in front of you! Trolls are way more powerful and taller than goblins! they're lv 6 monsters at least! "Pay or suffer the consequences (5 gold)".

the troll was easily twice tall than you (3 meters more or less). He was a forest troll. Just like the swamp trolls, forest trolls he was quite thin despite his height, he also had semi long hair that were hidding a part of his face; Just like most of forest trolls, his skin color was green pale.

There was no way you were giving a single piece of your hard-earned gold to this barbaric troll! You quietly tip-toed toward the bridge, careful not to make any noise that would wake the beast. You could very easily sneak around the troll, there was just one small... no, big problem...

Specifically, the troll's big feet. He was leaned up against a tree, and his massive soles were facing you. You could see that they were covered in dirt; monster boys typically avoided footwear, and this troll is no different. You thought for just a second what it would be like to worship before shaking the impure thoughts from your head and moving on.

The shape of the path and the trees meant you had to get closer to the troll than what was comfortable. You stood next to his feet, and you could see that his feet from heel to toe are about as tall as your legs! Just them, he unconsciously wiggled his toes, wafting a vinegary odor toward you. It smelt strangely pleasant to you... you catch yourself taking deeper and deeper breaths through your nose, enjoying the scent of the troll's feet. (-5 MP)

Eventually, you couldn't take it anymore. You had to get more of this sexy monster's smelly feet, consequences be damned! You got down on your knees in front of the troll's soles. His toes came up to your breasts. You leaned forward into the wiggling toes, getting as close as you can without actually touching them. You could feel the body heat from his feet radiating onto your face. You inhale deeply, filling your lungs with the troll's sweaty, cheesy foot smell. The sour odor singes your nostrils, but you love it. (-5 MP)

You can't hold yourself back anymore. You dive into the troll's toes and begin licking them. You lap at their undersides, and then inbetween each and every toe. You mouth fills with salty sweat and toejam, which you swallow happily. All the while, the musky odor surrounding you makes you feel light-headed and unaware of your surroundings, aside from the feet in front of you. The troll's toes battered your face and matted your hair with footsweat. You lick up and down his massive green soles, leaving streaks across the dirt. You've never been happier than right here, at this superior monster boy's superior feet. (-5 MP)

Still, deep down, you know this is wrong, and you know you need to move on, but the troll's feet are so big, and so tasty, and there's so much of them you haven't worshiped....

The plant boy smirked, bent over, and undid the straps on his right sandal. "Oh, we'll see about that..." The plant boy lifted his newly-bared sole to you and wiggled his toes. You could see that they were positively filthy! You unconsciously licked your lips. "How about you get on your knees and water my roots, babe?" (-5 MP)

"at 3, I'm going to run. If I fight him I'll lose with my weakened mind. 1 ... those feet are still cute though ... 2 ... It's really hard but it's either that or eternal foot slavery ... 2.5 ... It's harder than I thought ... those monsters' feet ... why are they so powerful? ... 3!"

What happens next?

You can't think about anything but monster boy feet anymore. Oh, how you'd love for the plant boy to tie you up with his leafy tendrils as the goblin you've fought prior makes you sniff his rancid soles! You peel off one of your well-worn boots and take a deep whiff of the insole, but it's not the same. It's not even half as smelly as the plant boy's sandals! 12111111112222211.content:
Nanmir: a little more and you thought you would never make it to that town! From what you could see this town was fortified. Apparently it was impossible to enter without being noticed by the guards at the entrance. They were two: one young man and one young woman. They looked quite nervous: there were many people trying to enter in the city at the same time. And guards were only two to control them, they feared a monster boy would try to attack the town or infiltrate it discreetly, taking advantage of the number of people in front of the door.Both guards were around 20, the female one had was a readhead with long hair and brown eyes, the other one was also around 20 and had short dark hair.

Once it was your turn to be controlled, the female guard took you in a private place (a wind-mill) so you wouldn't be disturbed while she body-searched you. She then made you smell something: it was mind recovery perfume. it made you recover 25 MP, it was to check if you were somehow controlled by the monsters.

"Alright young girl, I know this might sounds hard to do after that long travel and considering your age but ... are you somewhat controlled by the monsters?

"What? No of course not!"

"Are you plotting against our city?"

"If by "plotting" you mean "searching a place to sleep and buy stuff" then yes ... otherwise, no, I'm not plotting anything. the only one I serve is the goddess"

"You seem clean to me ... alright I ..."

You're finally in a safe place: you have nothing to fear from monsters here. There were huge stone walls and guards to protect citizens ... you could finally stride across streets without risking to be attacked by a monster boy. there were finally people who acted normally and seemed happy. That was not something you could see often these days ... and unfortunately, as long as the king of monsters will plug away, this world will not know peace. there were torches on walls ... yes: it was hard to believe but it took you the whole day to go here!

streets looked like your typical small but fortified town: paving stone for the ground, and stone houses. So far nothing really unusual to talk about. You saw several buildings by looking on your left and on your right.

Where will you go first?
12111111112222211111.title: First night at Nanmir

choices: You have a restful night's sleep and feel rejuvenated.
Your sleep is plagued by erotic nightmares...
121111111122222111111.content:
You're far too weary to continue walking for long. Not only that, your newfound addiction makes focusing on anything except monster boy feet very difficult, even after a spritzing of that mind recovery perfume. Fortunately, it doesn't take long to find an inn. You stagger in through its wooden door, and are greeted by the sight of a smiling bartender, serving drinks to patrons. It feels as if it's been ages since you've gazed upon such a warm, friendly sight, and it is definitely welcome after the hell you've been put through. (+10 MP)

You ask the bartender for a room. "That'll be three gold," he replies. Fair enough, you think. You hand him three gold pieces, and he hands you a room key in return. You're so tired, you don't even remove your garments before laying across the bed. You drift off to sleep as soon as your head hits the soft pillows adorning the bed...

Your MP: 60/100
Gold: 12
121111111122222111111.title: A place to rest

1211111111222221111111.content:
You slept! After all what happens in that forest you finally slept! It sounds like something normal ... but not for you ... not for so many people who are victims of monsters!

You spent a wonderful night and your recovered 25 MP (85/100 remaining). And for once ... you started to wake up not because of unnatural noises, but because of a human voice:

"Breakfast is ready. Can I come in?"

"Yes"

The inn's owner entered and meft a meal-tray on your bed: there were oranges, kiwis, bread, jam, brioche ... 3 golds was definitely an honnest price for that!

You ate it and recovered 15 MP. You have now all your 100 MP! You felt ready ... ready to explore town or go outside.

There were so many things to do. You could either simply explore town as a tourist, or you could try to ask someone if he/she needed help (subquests with rewards), You could also try to see some shops in case they sell something useful (you have 12 gold) or you could continue your travel immediately.

12111111112222211111111.content: Ok you want to stay here for the moment, but what for?
12111111112222211111111.title: Exploration time!

121111111122222111111112.content:
You walked down the city streets, taking in the sights and sounds of a life previously unfamiliar to you. You didn't get to leave the village often, so seeing how the city folk lived was quite the breath of fresh air.

Soon, you stumbled into the town square. In the center, you could see a fairly large wooden board. Several scraps of paper were nailed to it. Taking a closer look, you could see that townsfolk use this board to make requests to all who see them, usually offering gold, items, or other services in exchange for aid. Scanning the board, only three requests caught your eye:

"URGENT: Wife kidnapped by rabbit boys! Offering 50 gold to the brave adventurer that brings her home!"

"Family heirloom stolen by fairies! A cache of magical items to whoever can recover it!"

"My farm is being terrorized by rat boys! Find their home and persuade them to leave! My horse and a collection of supplies to anyone who can help!"

These all had quite the hefty reward attached. With that amount of gold, you could buy a very nice weapon, as well as armor, potions and whatever else you may need. The "magical items" sound vague, but they may be more powerful than you could even imagine! The horse, in addition to cut time spent travelling by a considerable amount, would make it much harder for any monster boys to ambush you en route to your destination.

Finally, you decide on...
121111111122222111111112.title: Providing aid

choices: You make it to the rabbits' warren.
1211111111222221111111121.content:
After some mulling upon the subject, you decide to rescue the citizen's wife. You've never seen a rabbit boy yourself, but you knew enough about them to know this won't be easy: despite their lithe, slender frames, they possessed overwhelming strength and agility... and libido. Still, this woman needs your help, and the gold reward is nothing to scoff at.

You find her husband, a typical high-society type, and questioned him about his wife's last whereabouts. In a frantic tone, he explains that they were out in the forest, picnicking in a spot fairly close to the city, where the sunlight pierced through the trees, when they were set upon by rabbit boys. He fought bravely to defend his wife, but alas, was thoroughly trounced. The rabbits spared his life, but took his wife in turn. You do your best to calm the man down and assure him you'll get his wife back.

You set out for the city gates. When you reached the edge of town, you hesitated and bit your lip. Thoughts of your last foray into the forest besieged your mind. Feet... so many feet... (-2 MP) Were you truly ready to risk your life and go back into the wilds? You take a deep breath and try to calm your nerves. You can do this.

You slowly walk down the forest path, extremely wary of any potential ambushes. Sure, being this close to the city means your chances of being set upon by monsters is significantly lower, but it happened to the rich couple, and could just as easily happen to you.

It wasn't long before you saw an opening off the main path. This path led into a patch of sunlit grass. The empty basket and food scraps strewn about tell you that this is where the pair were attacked. Looking closely, you can see some footprints on the ground. They are big and long, and... rabbit-like. Undoubtedly, these footprints belong to your mark. You follow the footprints deeper into the forest, in search of the woman and her captors.

Your MP: 98/100
1211111111222221111111121.title: Rescuing the maiden in distress!

choices: Attack them now and take them by surprise!
1211111111222221111111122.content:
You decided to stop thsoe fairies first because the reward sounds really interesting. From what you could read on the paper, the theft happened in a manor at the north of the town. You decided to go there first.

The manor was really huge ... but fortunately, you quickly knew where fairies were: they letted fairy powder behind them! it almost looked like golden dust.

apparently they were still somewhere in town! As you followed the powder trace, you noticed darker street, almost abandonned! You were literally the only person here! Which was quite reassuring. Honnestly you could expect some bad encounters in this cut-throat area!

The fairies were slowed down by what they tried to steal ... fortunately for you, in addition to the powder that guided you to them, they stole something and had eyes bigger than their stomach. You could hear them at the corner of the next street!

What will you do attack ow and try to take them by surprise? Or first watch them?

Note: you have a weapon with an atk of 1. In addition to your natural atk, you'll inflict 2 dmg to fairies at each successful attack (+ 1 potential dmg if the sneaky attack works), Fairies don't have armors so they won't reduce dmg.
1211111111222221111111122.title: let's stop the thieves!

12111111112222211111111222.content:
Before turning the corner and swinging wildly at your targets, you decided to first observe your targets. You pressed your body against the corner of a building and peered past it. You could see that there were three of them: one with blue hair, one with red, and one with black. They were all struggling to hold up what you could only assume is the object you're tasked to retrieve: a glorious onyx stone, set into a golden necklace. You can see why the employer is offering such a hefty reward, that thing must be worth a fortune on its own!

You can hear the fairies chatting while they slowly flutter away.

Blue: "Huff... huff... are we almost out of here? This thing is ridiculously heavy!"

Red: "Yeah, plus I hate this place! It smells like... human..."

Black: "Quiet, you two, one of them might hear us! We're getting paid very well to get this pendant, and if we get caught, we might never get out!"

That's odd... monster boys, to the best of your knowledge, often perform tasks on their own, usually purely to spite humans. It seems that these three are stealing the pendant for someone else, someone who may have bigger plans. You could keep watching and hope they let some more information slip, or you could attack here and now.
12111111112222211111111222.title: Wait and see

choices: Listen to voices (in case someone want to write another dialog)
121111111122222111111112222.content:
You were definitely intrigued! Monsters don't work for someone else usually! and that could be a problem to defeat thsoe fairies right now: their boss could always send someone else ... you definitely had to destroy that criminal network. But for that, oyu had to follow those fairies discreetly!

and that task was rather easy: fairies were too focused on their task to see if someone was following them!

You followed them, and followed them again and again ... due to the mass of the necklace they were a lot slower than usual! 30 minute of (easy) spying later and afte they went through tons of streets (seriously, this town was a real maze), they went in a kind of abandonned old house. The place looked almost haunted from the outside.

Fairies entered inside and you decided to wait for 20 seconds in case they were still in the entrance. After that delay, you followed them inside and ... there was nothing but stairs to go higher, and two rooms on your left and right! You quickly checked rooms but didn't see fairies ... suddenly, you noticed a kind of trapedoor that semi-hidden. Your instinct told you theyr definitely used it.

Once you opened it, you saw stairs going in a kind of basement ... and it was definitely bigger than your usual cellar. Once inside, you noticed many torches on the wall (that were made of stone). You also saw chests, barrels etc ... maybe they were smugglers! After a moment you heard voices! You decided to hide behind barrels to listen ...
121111111122222111111112222.title: agent 008

1211111111222221111111122221.content:
Crouching behind the barrels, you listened closely to the voices. You could identify which fairy was speaking, but there was a fourth voice that you didn't recognize. He must be the one who hired the fairies!

Blue: "Ugh... here you go, it was a pain to carry this far..."

???: "Hmm... yes, excellent! This is precisely what I was looking for! Nice work lads, I'm very pleased!"

Red: "Yeah, yeah, be as pleased as you want, just as long as we get paid..."

???: "Yes, but of course. I've dispatched an agent to deliver three human slaves to your dwelling, as promised..."

Human slaves!? This shady business just went from bad to worse. It's one thing to steal from citizens, but it's another to capture and enslave them! You'll see to it that this ring of criminal activities will be stopped! Peeking over the edge of the barrel, you could see that the fairies are talking to...
1211111111222221111111122221.title: Secret rendezvous

choices: Try to run away discreetly or come with a strategy.
12111111112222211111111222211.content:
You were disgusted by what you heard! You hoped their conversation would help you to find where human slaves would be kept prisonner or delivered.

"Will you deliver them at ..." Asked a fairy

"Yup: the usual place: the docks, it's the perfect place for this kind of traffic ha ha!"

"Alright ... time to go to the docks then!"

"Already? It won't happen before ... one hour!"

"Yes we know but even us monsters, can't stand the smell of your filthy feet! Rat boys have dirty feet but you're one of the worst we ever saw!"

You machinally smelled the air and yup: you could smell a powerful odor coming most likely from the rat boy's feet. You were easily 12 meters away from him and yet it was powerful enough to make you lose 1 MP (99 remaining).

"Tss! Fine! leave them ..."

Fairies just left the lair ... leaving you alone with the rat boy: you looked at him for a moment and despite the condition of his feet, he looked quite attractive and awesome to be honest. Also he looked barely older than you!

What will you do?
12111111112222211111111222211.title: let's deal with those dirty criminals!

121111111122222111111112222111.content:
With a battle cry, you rose from your hiding place and charged at the filthy rat! Unfortunately, rat boys have keen reflexes. Despite catching him off-guard, he was able to very easily react to your charge. He sidestepped, leaving you careening into a stack of crates. You hit the ground, and before you could get back up, the rat boy stomped his smelly heel into your face! (-5 MP)

"Oh, what's this?" chimed the rat boy. "Most of the time, I have to find the slaves myself. It's very rare that they come to me." You moan and struggle beneath the rat boy's cheesy foot. (-5 MP)

Eventually, you get a good grip on the rat boy's foot, and manage to shove it off of you and stand back up. Strangely, you sniff at your fingers that touched the malodorous foot. It's noxious scent remained on your fingers... (-5 MP)

You take a deep breath to clear your mind. "I'm not here to offer myself as a slave, I'm here to stop you!"

The rat boy smugly grins. "Is that so? I'd like to see you try, it's always fun to see them squirm before they beg to smell my feet..."

You're filled with rage as you charge at the rat boy once more, invigorated with a passion to stop this disgusting monster!

Your MP: 84/100
Rat boy's HP: 7/7
121111111122222111111112222111.title: Rat bastard!

choices: Let him do what he wants on purpose!
1211111111222221111111122221111.content:
That monster was cocky! He expected you to fall for his feet but you were the goddess' servant, you couldn't possibly do such a thing ... for the moment!

So far your mind is not affected. With 84 Mp remaining you still think his feet are filthy ... and well they're ... anyway you grabbed your steel rod firmly and dashed at the rat boy. Fortunately this time he didn't dodge because he thought you were already loving his feet! That made him lose one extra damage (- 3 HP = 4 remaining).

But that cocky attitude was part of his plan! Yes he took one powerful hit ... but in the same time he trapped your ankle with his tail and made you fall on your back!

You didn't have time to recover: the quick monster boy was already "attacking" you with his feet: rubbing them on your cheek and transfering a part of their dirt on your cheeks and of course ... it made you lose more MP (- 5 = 79 remaining).

"No! Not again! Get your feet out of my face monster!"

"Certainly not: I can't wait to enslave you!"

You were powerless as he continued to rub his feet on your face! the powerful smell was invading your nostrils ... and your mind as well (- 5 MP. 74 remaining). You lost 1/4 of your MP: you started to think monster boy's feet weren't that bad as dirty as they were.

The rat boy noticed a change in your attitude: your facial expression was different.

"So: ready to serve my feet now?"

The kinky talk ... another powerful weapon monster and their hot feet had against your very vulnerable mind - 5 MP: 69 remaining)! You honnestly considered serving his feet for a moment ... but in the same time you remembered your mission and people who suffer because of those creatures.
1211111111222221111111122221111.title: The prietess's wrath!

12111111112222211111111222211111.content:
Despite the acrid scent of the rat boy's feet invading your nostrils as well as your mind, you still kept your wits together enough to avoid falling prey to them! You grabbed ahold of his ankle and threw him off of you... after taking one more quick sniff of his feet. (-5 MP)

The rat boy wasn't particularly heavy, so you could easily push him back quite a distance. Rather, he relied on his speed and dexterity to defeet opponents. He quickly regained his stance after tumbling back. He snickered as your rose to your feet.

"Heh heh, I was gonna let you serve my feet easily, but you just had to put up a fight, huh? I'm gonna show you what happens to slaves who don't know their place... right after I show you how hopeless outclassed you are!"

After he finished his sentence, he seemingly disappeared into thin air! You raised your steel rod and scanned the area in front of you... until you felt a tap on your shoulder. You spun around, wildly flailing your rod, but the rat is already several paces out of your range.

"You're gonna have to be a lot faster than THAT!"

You lunged forward at the rat boy, but he already darted away! You spun in circles, looking for the speedy rodent, but he was nowhere to be found.

"Psst, up here!"

You raised your head to the ceiling... and were greeted by the sight of the rat boy's feet! His soles came crashing down into your face, sending you into the ground for a third time. The rat boy poked at your lips with his big toe while you hungrily inhaled the addictingly cheesy funk radiating from his nasty feet... (-5 MP)

"Don't you get it now? You don't stand a chance against me, girlie. Just part those pretty lips of yours and start sucking on my toes, or else I'll start making things a whole lot worse for you..."

Your MP: 54/100
Rat boy's HP: 4/7

choices: The rat boy uses a strange object or will use a spell!
The rat boy has dirty plans for you ^^

With 54/100 MP remaining you were almost reaching state 2 of weakened mind but ... despite your position and despite his dirty feet constantly teasing your face ... you faced the rat boy with determination. You were thinking of slave humans that would be conducted to the docks ... and that motivated you not to lose this fight.

You firmly grabbed your steel rod and gave a powerful hit just behind the rat boy's knee which made him fall on his back (the rat boy lost 2 HP because of this assault: 2/7 HP remaining). The creature falled was back on the ground ... you quickly stood up and tried to attack him again while he was on the ground but ... the rat boy once again used his agility and dodged your attack.

He was already on his (not so bad) feet, facing you with a real determination!

"Ok now I'm mad! I'm not going to hold back anymore!"

"Ho ... hold back?"

You were really starting to worry as the monster created an ominous atmosphere in the room ... You were wondering what he was going to do ... you remembered he said he'd "tart making things a whole lot worse for you" if you continued to resist ... but you thought he was just bluffing ...

How will the rat boy react?

[you: 54/100 MP ... rat boy: 2/7 HP remaining]

choices: You shake off the laughter and react!
The rat boy pins you again!

The rat boy takes out a small leather pouch and hurls it at you. As it flies through the air, its contents spew forth from its opening, coating you in some sort of strange dust. You stumbled backward, coughing and hacking as the strange powder gets into your lungs.

The mysterious powder made you feel funny. Like, REALLY funny! You started snickering, which evolved into giggles, which in turn became full raucous laughter! Despite the rat boy planning to dominate you with his soles, you couldn't help but to feel so funny and carefree!

The rat boy laughed himself, but it was more of a menacing, evil laugh compared to the joyous one you were letting out. "Heheh, you really like that laughing powder, huh? You're not gonna be laughing once you're back under my filthy feet..."

Your MP: 54/100 [STUNNED]

(- 5 MP: 44/100)

"seems like you're enjoying yourself ... how about you suck on my toes!"

"He he he! Sounds so funny hi hi hi"

You happily took the rat boy's dirty foot in your hand and before you started to suck on his toes you looked at the feet ... they were so cute even or ... perhaps especially when dirty. You didn't hesitate one second and happily sucked on his toe, just as if it was a lollipop. A wonderful aroma started to invade your mouth: the taste of the rat boy's dirty and stinky feet ... with half of your MP gone it almost tasted like a nectar. you were so happy ... does it really worth it to fight something that makes you happy like that?

You giggled as you slurped his toes, swallow mouthful after mouthful of the rat boy's foul foot funk. "Hee hee, yeah, your feet are sooooo cute!" The rat boy smiled as your tongue ran up and down his dirty soles, the stench from his foul feet eroding away at your mind. (-5 MP)

Deep down, you knew that all of this was wrong, but you just can't help it. His sweaty, sexy feet just feel right in your mouth, and who are you to question that?

the laughing powder was in your lungs ... the powerful smell of that monster boy's feet were invading your nostrils ... but you also had an extremely strong will of fighting when other people were menaced!

It would be best to go ahead and leave while you're ahead before you risk enslavement at the rat boy's feet.

You quietly escaped the smugglers' den, being extra cautious in case there were any more smugglers around. After that, reaching the manor was an extremely simple task.

You knock on the door and are greeted by a butler. You present him the necklace, and he invites you inside the spacious home. He leads you to his master's chambers, and you're greeted by the man who posted the quest. He was rather portly, but quite well-dressed. He beamed brightly when you presented him the necklace.

"Oh, thank you so much, kind adventuress! You have no idea how much this means to me! Now, a promise is a promise, and I am a man of my word..." he stands up and walks toward a treasure chest in the corner of his room. He opens it, revealing the promised cache of magical items! There's a dozen of them, all of varying value, but the item that caught your eye the most is...

You decided the ring of transformation could definitely be useful so you selected that item among all others.

"Then you should drink that. Things like that cost a fortune but I have the feeling it worth it!"

The man then tried to search for something in a chest and you a huge bottle of red potion.

"It's a powerful elixir that will fully restore your MP, even if you drink just half of the bottle!"

You felt like you needed it ... with barely 34 MP remaining you would have problems with your next fight. You did as your host suggested and drank the potion ... all of those fetish ideas immediately vanished from your head and you have now once again 100 MP remaining.

"thank you again mister!"

"No I should thank you ... for recovering my necklace and for defending humanity against those creatures. Ah one thing before you leave: this ring of transformation is useful but it also gradually weaken your mind so be careful with it!"

You thanked him once more and left the manor ... Now you had one question in mind ... what should you do?

You approach the innkeeper, who looks very happy to see you. "I've heard word of your good deeds," he tells you. "It would be my honor to have you rest in my humble inn... free of charge, of course."

"What's happening again?!"

You started to ignore those noises but they didn't stop ... it was not a small incident! Something serious was happening. What will you do?

You groaned as you dragged yourself out of bed. What were people doing out and about at this hour? It's almost three in the morning, such noise was unacceptable! You grabbed your rod and shield just to be safe before stepping out of the safety of your room.

The innkeeper was nowhere to be seen. This wasn't unusual, seeing how it was so late, but his absence still left a bad feeling in the pit of your heart.

You swung open the inn door and saw...

Just one sight on the scene was enough for you to understand what was happening: you saw some kind of "flyring goblins". They were very special goblins ... smaller than others (barely 1 m 20), they were on the other hand more intelligent than average (for goblins). Most of times they like to use technology and science to "have fun" ... which is the reason some called them "goblin pranksters" ... but despite their name you shouldn't go easy with them. You slowly trekked down the right-hand path, fearfully clutching your steel rod. The trees thickened and nearly concealed the path the further you walked. The canopy above you almost completely blotted out the sun, allowing only the stray ray of light to pierce the leafy veil.

You didn't encounter any monsters while walking down the trail, but you almost wish you did when you came up upon the open mouth of a deep cave. If your maps are right, this path should lead to Nanmir in a matter of hours... but you're also forced to hike straight through a deep, dark cave. Monster boys that call caves their home are used to living with no light, putting them at a massive advantage above you. Seeing no other way forward, you retrieve a torch from your pack and strike it, illuminating the surrounding area. You took a deep breath before wondering into the cave.

The cold air in the cave nipped at your face as you slowly slogged through the narrow corridor. Thankfully, the cave seems to be linear in fashion; you haven't encountered a fork in the path as of yet. No monster boys, either, which is always a plus.

You fear you jinxed yourself as you hear a giggle echoing further down the passageway. "Well well well, what do we have here?" a distinctly male voice called out. You clutched your steel rod and raised your torch, revealing your adversary:

You can see the wear and tear on them from here... and smell it, as well. (-3 MP) He grinned at you, sharp fangs jutting from his mouth. No doubt about it, this is a spider boy. Of course, we both know that's exactly the truth..." The spider boy kicked one of his sandals upward, snatching it out of the air in one of his many hands. "But you're not so simple as to admit the truth to your enemy, are you?"

You found yourself glancing at the spider boy's bared foot. It's shapely, with long, slender toes... it disturbs you how easily you can see yourself beneath that sole. (-5 MP)

Still, keeping him farther than an arm's reach won't do much to help you. You have to get around the spider boy one way or another.

12131.content:
A warrior eh? There are basically two types of warriors:


Paladin
The Paladin is a holy knight, crusading in the name of good and order. their play style is a mix between a fighter and a cleric, as they focus on melee but still employ use of holy and cleansing magic. In addition, compared to other classes the paladin class has one of the most restrictive codes of conduct in their single-mindedness and utter devotion to good. Paladin characters are expected to demonstrate and embody goodness, lest they want to offend the god they serve. they are beloved by all for their heroism and devotion to good, and as such often receive discounts at shops and taverns.

Dark Knight
The Dark Knight is a stark contrast to the Paladin. They refuse to follow the strict code of honor that the paladins follow, and as such their fighting style often includes using dirty tricks such as taunting the enemy or using illusion magic to gain an unfair advantage. Even through Dark knights aren't always a-moral thieves and marauders they are often treated as such due to not following the code of honor mentioned before. This makes many aspiring dark knights adopt a life of wandering and robbing the corpses of enemies for equipment.

Which one will you be?
